mapper.select: SELECT A.SEQ AS seq, A.TITLE AS title, A.CATEGORY AS category, A.MAXNUM AS maxNum, A.PRICE AS price, B.FILENO AS fileno, CONCAT('/upload/', B.FILENAME) AS filename, B.UPLOADPATH AS uploadpath FROM BOARD A LEFT OUTER JOIN ATTACH B ON A.SEQ = B.SEQ WHERE A.SEQ IN ( SELECT C.DETAIL_NO FROM MEMBERLIST AS C WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{parId} AND B.SEQ = C.DETAIL_NO ) ORDER BY SEQ DESC LIMIT 4
